data.name: Turmeric Indian Bistro
data.description: A cozy Indian bistro offering the best turmeric-inspired dishes in the heart of the city.
data.hours: Tue–Thu 4:00 pm–12:00 am, Fri–Sat 4:00 pm–1:00 am, Sun 2:00 pm–10:00 pm

menus.name: Discounted
menus.description: Enjoy our discounted menu offered by the restaurant with a variety of appetizers, entrées, drinks, and desserts tailored specifically for you.

items.name: Chicken Malai Tikka
items.description: Creamy marinated chicken skewers grilled to perfection, served with mint chutney.

items.name: Beef Kathi Roll
items.description: Spiced beef wrapped in a soft paratha with onions and chutney.

items.name: Lamb Vindaloo
items.description: Tender lamb cooked in a fiery vindaloo sauce with potatoes.

items.name: Butter Chicken
items.description: Succulent chicken pieces simmered in a rich, creamy tomato sauce.

items.name: Chana Masala
items.description: Chickpeas cooked in a spicy tomato and onion gravy, served with naan.

items.name: Mango Lassi
items.description: Sweet and creamy yogurt-based mango drink.

items.name: Masala Chai
items.description: Spiced Indian tea brewed with milk and aromatic herbs.

items.name: Jeera Soda
items.description: Refreshing soda infused with roasted cumin seeds.

items.name: Coca Cola
items.description: Minty lime soda with a hint of sweetness.

items.name: Gulab Jamun
items.description: Milk-based dumplings soaked in rose-scented sugar syrup.

items.name: Rasmalai
items.description: Soft cheese dumplings soaked in saffron and cardamom-flavored milk.
